name: Dice Runner (Parven, Akilan)
description:
Gameplay

The game's basic premise is that you roll dice as a player to try and reach the diamond in a maze. There are endless levels in this game. This is a leisurely game that can be played to pass the time.

Controls
  • Use WASD to move
Credits
  • Parven - Coding & Design
  • Akilan - Artist 
Assets
